response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to me at a price of $10,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to you and my personal valuation, aiming to ensure both parties are satisfied. Should you be interested in exploring this opportunity further, please let me know. I look forward to potentially working together.", "product_price": 10000}
